wifindus.eye.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • wifindus.eye.EyeApplication
      • wifindus.eye.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, DeviceEventListener, IncidentEventListener, NodeEventListener, UserEventListener

    public class Server
extends EyeApplication
    A specialized form of EyeApplication that processes incoming UDP packets from client devices, adds them to a MySQL database, and informs TCP-connected Dispatcher instances that they must update.
    Author:
    Mark 'marzer' Gillard
